greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The upper left triangular section of square array A091255, read by rows.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10440; the first 144 rows of triangular table
Index entries for sequences operating on polynomials in ring GF(2)[X]
formula: A(n,k) = A091255(n,k), with k in range 1 .. n.
program: A327856list(up_to) =  { my(v = vector(up_to), i=0); for(a=1,oo, for(col=1,a, i++; if(i > up_to, return(v)); v[i] = A091255sq(a,col))); (v); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 28 2019
